title: Accomplished
description: Sit with your legs stretched in front of you. Bend your right leg and place your heel near your perineum. Bend your left leg and stack the left ankle on top of the right. Tuck your left toes in between your right thigh and calf. Lengthen your spine. Rest the backs of your hands on your knees with your thumbs and index fingers touching. Close your eyes. Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Carefully release the legs. Tuck toes in between thigh and calf Modification: Sit on a bolster or block.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
